page.title: 07Food in St.Helens
page.content: I suppose most people in St.Helens eat their meals at home,but on special occasions people go out to a restaurant for a meal. For breakfast many people have a cereal or toast.Not many people these days have a cooked breakfast. At midday we have what we call dinner.Most children stay at school for their dinner.Some children bring a packed lunch,while an equal number have a school dinner. For tea people have a wide variety of food.Those who have a cooked meal at midday often have only a snack. Those who have a snack at midday usually have a cooked meal. At supper-time some people have a sandwich or soup,while others like to go out to buy chips or a Chinese meal.
